name: Bulldozer (itch) (Mathieu Voisin)
description:
Cut as much wood as possible before the forest disappears. To win, you must maneuver your bulldozers as well as possible and recover as many trees as possible. But be careful not to be blocked by your opponents! If one of your bulldozers gets stuck on a square, the game is over for him.

In this fast and addictive game, play alone or with your family against 1 to 4 players or computers. The goal is simple but don't count on other players to let you be the best lumberjack.

What will be your strategy for winning?
